Text:
Hi, I just started collecting comics, old and new. I was wondering, after seeing the massive amount that you have can you possibly e-mail me the torrents that you have, because it's gonna take me forever to catch up on things.

Thanks
rofl... seriously DJBOBCAT88?  Why don't you ask him to buy you a 3 terabyte drive and upload his entire collection and send it to your house WHY DONT YA!
